title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

I thought the deck was pretty solid, albeit with a bit of a high curve. I won round one versus white green by racing with fliers. I lost round 2 to monoblack – just got outraced by those dang vamps! I am sad that I never got to cast Sorin Markov =(

items.content_html: Have your app create a temp file on startup and periodically check if it still exists. Your batch script can just delete that file to terminate the app.
